channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
Making a minigame and I need an area so people cant teleport out of.
I have everything ready I just need to know:
When finding the coords do I go by NW corner and SE corner or NE corner and SW corner?

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

The X coordinate is horizontal (West-East/East-West) and the Y coordinate is vertical (North-South/South-North). I’ve made it easy for you in the code I’ve given you; for example, just replace “minimumXValue” with the smallest X value in the area.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

When you take the coords, you will notice some are bigger than others, use your brain and you can fill out Prima’s example no problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @99str3ngth99 99str3ngth99
item.description:
@99str3ngth99 wrote:

No I mean like, which cordinate do I take first?

Is it, North East and South West or North West and South East?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

if ((absX >= minimumXValue && absX <= maximumXValue) && (absY >= minimumYValue && absY <= maximumYValue)) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport out of this area."); return; }

Just add that above your teleportation code/at the top of your teleportation method.

Read full topic
